title: FS - T206 Walsh SGC A Gorgeous Card!
author: trambo

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Walsh SGC A Gorgeous Card!
posts.post_content:
Freshly back from SGC with the "A" grade due to an "evidence of trimming"   noted by the grader.  A few of us have used a loupe and can't find the trimming but apparently the SGC grader did!   

Asking $350 net including USPS shipping w/tracking.  PM to discuss.

Thanks!!
